name: Tom's Adventure
description:
The aliens invaded the earth and kidnapped Tom's sister!

Help Tom rescue his little sister through challenging 21 levels in this awesome platformer game!



-21 levels - Play 21 challenge hand-crafted levels filled with deadly traps and allien enemy. Including a robot boss!
-Tight controls - Very simple and responsive gameplay, optmized controls for gamepads and keyboards!
-Challenging difficulty.
-Retro - Nice pixel graphics and chiptune music!
